tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (VBN Been)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN living) (NN room))) (PP (IN for) (NP (ADVP (RB almost) (NP (CD 2) (NNS days))) (JJ straight) (NN lol)))) (: ...)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Been/VBN nmod:in>[room/NN case>in/IN nmod:poss>my/PRP$ compound>living/NN] nmod:for>[lol/NN case>for/IN advmod>[almost/RB nmod:npmod>[days/NNS nummod>2/CD]] amod>straight/JJ] punct>.../:]
